data.title: Front B Site Clear Execute Dart
data.description: Here's a fast, yet effective way to execute the B Site. This lineup allows you to run with your team as they are scaling, to fight.

data.title: B Lobby to Courtyard Dart
data.description: Use this Recon Bolt lineup to get info on B Market from up high.

data.title: B Site Drone to Market + Back Site Dart Execute
data.description: Use your drone to clear close site, before lining up a Recon Bolt to get info on back of B Site.

data.title: A Ramp to Close Site Dart
data.description: Get info on A Site and behind Generator with this Recon Bolt lineup.

data.title: Early A Lobby to Link Dart
data.description: Use this early round Recon Bolt lineup to quickly gain info at A Link.
